Metaphor:ADDRESSING POVERTY IS TREATING AN ILLNESS

Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss ADDRESSING POVERTY IS TREATING AN ILLNESS
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description e.g. "cure us of poverty"
Comments
Tags
Family Poverty metaphors, Physical afflictions metaphors, Poverty as a social problem metaphors
Metaphor Level Specific
Metaphor Type Composed/complex, Entailed
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Treating a physical affliction
Roles:treatment_provider, treatment_recipient, treated_affliction, treatment_procedure, treatment_tools, treatment_x-schema
Target Frame Addressing poverty
Roles:poverty, impoverished, problem_solvers, problem-solving_actions


Mappings:

poverty <= disease
policy_makers <= medical_professionals
impoverished_entity <= body
policies <= treatment_strategies

Examples:
